title: What is this IP bug
body: i made a thread i little while ago about my ip amounts changing, but now i cant afford anything 4800 ip even though i have 5000. What is this?

replies.body:
This is an annoying bug that sometimes pops up on the Beta Client. You should be able to resolve this by swapping over to the Legacy Client from the login screen to complete your purchase:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked! ^.^

As i just posted before I noticed this thread, I had a similar issue except that after re-logging, my IP balance decreased (to apparently what the store thought I had) but the question is how did it think I have more?

The bug with IP balance can cause your balance to be off in many ways, including displaying a *higher value* than what is accurate. I don't know the specifics about the bug past the symptoms and fix, but I'm glad to hear you resolved the issue now.

If you run into further issues with this, let me know.
